select rownum as seq, ord.ordid, mid, prd.prdname, prdbrand, ordtotalamount, ordtotalprice, ordrequest, ordstatus, ordpostnum, ordcreatedat, ordreceivername, ordreceiveraddress, ordreceiverzipcode, ordreceiverphone, odt.prdcode, odtamount, odt.prdprice
from orders ord, ordersdetail odt, product prd
where ord.ordid=#{ordid} and ord.ordid = odt.ordid and odt.prdcode = prd.prdcode

select rownum as seq, ord.ordid, ord.mid, mem.mcreatedat, prd.prdname, prdbrand, ordtotalamount, ordtotalprice, ordrequest, ordstatus, ordpostnum, ordcreatedat, ordreceivername, ordreceiveraddress, ordreceiverzipcode, ordreceiverphone, odt.prdcode, odtamount, odt.prdprice, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review rev WHERE rev.ordid = ord.ordid AND rev.prdcode = odt.prdcode AND rev.mid = ord.mid) AS revcount
from orders ord, ordersdetail odt, product prd, member mem
where ord.ordid = odt.ordid and ord.mid = mem.mid and odt.prdcode = prd.prdcode and mem.mid=#{mid} and TRUNC(ord.ordcreatedat, 'MM') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM')
